summary: Male Khajiit has an hair model with lots of long hair, females miss this, so I converted it to females, added earrings to make it look better.
descriptionHtml:
Male Khajiit has an hair model with lots of long hair, females miss this, so I converted it to females, added earrings to make it look better.

Critical update please download this, the old one changed other things in game.

Updated with conveted three more male hairs to female, two sort of braids and an mohawk
No I can not go the other way, the female hairs clip with the larger male head, 
Has to modify the mesh for it to work and the unique female hair are not as interesting in my oppinion.
author: Zaria
